top.title: US wants Russia and Ukraine to end war by June, says Zelensky
top.summary: The Ukrainian leader says difficult issues remain, as Russia carries out further strikes on energy facilities.

top.title: General shot in Moscow conscious after surgery, Russian media say
top.summary: Lt Gen Vladimir Alexeyev was shot several times inside his apartment block on Friday morning.

top.title: Trump says he 'didn't see' part of video with racist clip depicting Obamas as apes
top.summary: The US president says he "didn't make a mistake", adding he had only seen the beginning of the video before it was posted.

top.title: Baldur's Gate to be turned into TV series - without the game's developers
top.summary: The show will be made by Craig Mazin, who co-created the acclaimed game adaptation The Last Of Us.

top.title: Uber ordered to pay $8.5m over claim driver raped passenger
top.summary: The verdict is expected to influence the outcome of thousands of other cases against the ride hailing firm.

top.title: Google staff call for firm to cut ties with ICE
top.summary: More than 900 Google employees signed a letter opposing company links to federal immigration actions.
